original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.16. Piṭṭhiduka, Kusalattika
analyzed: piṭṭhiduka kusalattika

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paccayā na dassanena pahātabbaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na akusalam dhammam paccayā dassanena pahātabbaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na dassanena pahātabbam na akusalam dhammam paccayā na dassanena

original: pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: pahātabbaḥ akusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā dve pe avigate dve

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na dassanena pahātabbaḥ abyākataḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na na dassanena pahātabbam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca

original: nadassanena pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā

original: dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dve adhipatiyā dve pe a vigate dve

original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbam na kusalam dhammam paccayā na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nadassanena pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na kusalam dhammam paccayā na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ kusalaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam na kusalam dhammam paccayā na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
